Page.title: recommendations
Page._content:
## Recommendations

### Technical
Information Theory
- Amos Lapidoth: A Foundation in Digital Communication

Latex
- Stefan Moser: [How to Typeset Equations in Latex](https://moser-isi.ethz.ch/docs/typeset_equations.pdf)

Computer Hardware 
- Michael D. Ciletti: Advanced Digital Design with the Verilog HDL
- David A. Patterson, John L. Hennessy: Computer Organization and Design
- [Papers by Ciff Cummings](http://www.sunburst-design.com/papers/), some personal favourites are:
    - [The Fundamentals of Efficient Synthesizable Finite State Machine Design using NC-Verilog and BuildGates](http://www.sunburst-design.com/papers/CummingsICU2002_FSMFundamentals.pdf)
    - [Finite State Machine (FSM) Design & Synthesis using SystemVerilog - Part I](http://www.sunburst-design.com/papers/CummingsSNUG2019SV_FSM1.pdf)



### Books
Science fiction
- Orson Scott Card, Ender's Game (series)
- Andy Weir, Project Hail Mary
- 劉慈欣, 三體 (The Three-Body Problem)
- Edwin Abbott Abbott, Flatland

Fiction
- Suzzane Collins, The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
- Suzzane Collins, The Hunger Games (series)

文學
- 莊子
- 紅樓夢
- 三國演義
- 西遊記


Finance
- Andrew Hallam, Millionaire Teacher: The Nine Rules of Wealth You Should Have Learned in School 
- Dan Bortolotti, Reboot Your Portfolio: 9 Steps to Successful Investing with ETFs

Page.title: about
Page._content:
I am a masters student in electrical engineering at ETH Zurich. I obtained my bachelor degree in Engineering Science (Electrical engineering option) from the University of Toronto.

### Contact
Email: johong [at] ethz [dot] ch


<!-- ## Interests -->
<!-- - Information Theory -->
<!-- - Communications -->

<!-- ## Experience -->

<!-- #### Research -->

<!-- Signal and Information Processing Laboratory (ISI), ETH Zurich -->
<!-- - Frequency Estimation with Factor graph and Expectation Maximization -->
<!--     - Supervisors: Dr. Hans-Andrea Loeliger, Dr. Hampus Malmberg -->
<!-- - Modulation Schemes for MISO Optical Intensity Channels -->
<!--     - Supervisors: Dr. Amos Lapidoth, Dr. Stefan Moser, Dr. Michèle Wigger -->

Post.title: Preface
Post._content: This blog serves as a place to document my journey—for work, for school, for learning, and for reading. Here, I hope to capture not just the technical highlights of my engineering career, but also the thoughts and moments I find meaningful beyond the engineering world, in life.
Post.raw:

title: Preface
date: 2025-02-09 15:21:03
tags:
---
This blog serves as a place to document my journey—for work, for school, for learning, and for reading. Here, I hope to capture not just the technical highlights of my engineering career, but also the thoughts and moments I find meaningful beyond the engineering world, in life.
